title: Fiber Crystals
description: Recommended for all intestinal cleansing support and especially important for people missing vegetable intake or eating processed foods.
cleaned_text: Pineapple enzyme powder, Taiwan fungus pine stem extract powder, apple enzyme powder, papaya enzyme powder, glucose, maltodextrin, vitamin C, lecithin. SUGGESTED USE Take one sachet per day before sleeping or take 2 per day if constipated with warm water
